```{r}

N = 0 
S = 0

for (i in 1:1000){
  x <- rnorm(100)
  e <- rnorm(100, 0, 2) 
  y <- 0.5 + 0*x +e
  xy.lm <- lm(y~x)
  pvalue = summary(xy.lm)$coefficient[2, 4]
  if(0.05>=pvalue){
    S = S+1
  }
  N = N + 1
  
}
S/N

```

```{r}
## Wrapping into a function
simulation1 <- function(Sample, I){
N = 0 
S = 0
for (i in 1:1000){
  x <- rnorm(Sample)
  e <- rnorm(Sample, 0, 2) 
  y <-  I+ 0*x +e
  xy.lm <- lm(y~x)
  pvalue = summary(xy.lm)$coefficient[2, 4]
  if(0.05>=pvalue){
    S = S+1
  }
  N = N + 1
  
  }
S/N
}

simulation1(100, 0.5)
```
